QueryDefinition.Query: SELECT CAST(RIGHT(Member_ID, LEN(Member_ID) - 1) AS BIGINT) AS person_id, CAST(RIGHT(Claim_ID, LEN(Claim_ID) - 1) AS BIGINT) AS visit_occurrence_id, 0 AS drug_concept_id, Date_of_prescription AS drug_exposure_start_date, CASE WHEN administered_days > 180 THEN 180 ELSE administered_days END AS days_supply, CASE WHEN Type_of_claim = 'Outpatient' OR Type_of_claim = 'Pharmacy' THEN 38000175 ELSE 38000180 END AS drug_type_concept_id, jmdc_drug_code AS drug_source_value, CASE WHEN prescribed_amount_per_day IS NOT NULL THEN CAST(prescribed_amount_per_day AS VARCHAR) + ' ' + Unit_of_administered_amount + ' per day' ELSE '' END + CASE WHEN As_needed_medication_flag = 1 THEN ' as needed' ELSE '' END + CASE WHEN administered_amount IS NOT NULL THEN ', ' + CAST(administered_amount AS VARCHAR) + ' ' + Unit_of_administered_amount + ' total' ELSE '' END AS sig, actual_point * 10 AS total_paid, drug_price * administered_amount as total_charge, 44818592 as CurrencyConceptId, CAST('1' + RIGHT(d.medical_facility_id, LEN(d.medical_facility_id) - 1) AS BIGINT) AS provider_id FROM {sc}.Drug d JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND d.Member_ID = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE order by CAST(RIGHT(Member_ID, LEN(Member_ID) - 1) AS BIGINT)
